title: Pixi Lip & Line - Nearly Clear
description: What it is:Lip liner & lipstick duo pencil in lip tone enhancing colors.What it is formulated to do:This twin lip contour liner and stay-on lipstick is the ultimate "lazy" lip must-have! Never again will you have to try and match your lip liner to your favorite lipstick - these are perfectly matched to look natural with ultimate lip care and definition. The lip liner formula is waterproof with anti-feathering properties to keep your lipstick color in place. The lipstick formula is long-lasting and packed with anti-aging ingredients to provide maximum hydration.Preservative free, mineral oil free, paraben free. No animal derived ingredients, not tested on animals.Beneficial Ingredients and what they do:1. Vitamins E to treat and protect lips2. Vitamin C to fend off free-radicals and energize

title: Covergirl Natureluxe Water Resistant Mousse Mascara, Very Black 520, 0.27-Ounce
description: Experience luxury touched by nature with the NatureLuxe Collection. The light-as-air Silk Foundation takes the heavy weight out of your polished finish. Our Mousse Mascara leaves your lashes looking light and lifted, with up to 2X more volume vs. bare lashes. Complete your simply gorgeous look with Gloss Balm’s touch of soft color and sheen.
